title: Astroboy 03
creator_credit: Satoshi Yamamoto, Hidehiko Takei and Tezuka Productions
brief_description: Three episodes in the adventures of the boy robot, created by Osamu Tezuka. The titles are: ‘The White planet’, ‘Atlas lives again’ and ‘Frankenstein’.
